content: stitch before the last stitch on the left needle is knit work k2tog if the stitch before the last stitch on the left needle is purl rearrange the stitches as in ssk and work p2tog through the back loop set up round work all stitches as set trh1e n continue as set without or with cables r2 work decreases on both needles work other stitches as set work all stitches as set repeat r1-r2 5 6 more times to have 6 7 decreases altogether on both needles repeat r1 until you have 9 10 stitches on each needle graft using kitchener stitch you may try to bind off purls as purls and knits as knits it is challenging knit the second sock 7 enjoy wearing without thinking which side is the wright side of the sock in addition for those who want to try the 90-stitch version instructions are actually the same as for s versiorn1 except that every needle has an additional cable on both sides cuff p2 k1 p2 k2 p1 k2 9 times altogether leg 9 pattern repeats described under leg the work only 2 additional rounds r1-r2 heel turn setup rearrangement of stitches is the same as for s except for one stitch pattern repeat more than for s heel transition r3 m1r p2 k1 p2 k2 p1 k2 4 times p2 k1 p2 k1l r4 k1 p2 k1 p2 k2 p1 k2 4 times p2 k1 p2 k1 r5 p1l p2 k1 p2 k2 p1 k2 4 times p2 k1 p2 k1 p1r r6 p1 k1 p2 k1 p2 k2 p1 k2 4 times p2 k1 p2 k1 p1 r7 m1r p1 k1 p2 k1 p2 k2 p1 k2 4 times p2 k1 p2 k1 p1 m1r r8 k1 p1 k1 pocl k2 p1 k2 4 times p2 k1 p2 k1 p1 m1r r9 p1l k1 p1 k1 p2 k1 p2 k2 p1 k2 4 times p2 k1 p2 k1 p1 k1 p1l r10 p1 k1 p1 k1 p2 k1 p2 k2 p1 k2 4 times k2 p1 k2 k1 p1 k1 p1 you added 4 stitches at both sides as a mini gusset 8 stitches altogether heel work 4 gusset stitches at the left side of the needle 1 as set and move them backwards to needle 2 move the last 4 stitches on needle 1 to needle 2 work short row heel across the remaining stitches on the needle 1 target for 14 german double stitches/wraps on each side working in the same way as for s foot decrease gusset stitches for 1 stitch at the beginning and 1 stitch at the end of the needle 2 every second row following instructions for decreases decrease 4 times having 90 stitches altogether on the needles toes need more decreases please adapt instructions appropriately adding decreasing repeats to your liking 8
